price: 41. Haddaan ku oofsanno, Annaga uun baa ka aarsan iyaga (gaalada).
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
